item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Brendan Langen]] This video gives a basic intro to TheBrain. It has a graphical and textual interface for navigating and editing your documents.

item.title: Troubleshooting and FAQ
item.description: Still having trouble? Here are a list of common questions and problems people encounter when installing Quartz. While you’re here, join our Discord :)

item.title: Twemex
item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Brendan Langen]] Twemex is a Twitter search overlay that enables deeper exploratory and focused search. Twemex aims to help users construct a memex within their own accounts.

item.title: Voiceliner
item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Rob Haisfield]] By [[P- Max Krieger]]. [[Twitter thread]] [[P- Robert Haisfield (Berkeley)]]: People who note down fleeting thoughts want the cream to rise to the top.

item.title: Waldo
item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Brendan Langen]] Waldo is a browser extension that amplifies Google search via advanced operators - scanning all keywords, images, and sentences on each webpage without having to open any links.

item.title: Wikum
item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Brendan Langen]] Wikum is a tool for rapidly organizing comments via recursive summarization in internet forums, affording a reader different views at the most important bits of information.

item.title: WorldBrain Memex
item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Brendan Langen]] WorldBrain’s Memex is an open-source, privacy-focused browser extension to search, annotate, organize and share your online research.

item.title: ZUI
item.description: Authored by:: [[P- Brendan Langen]] A Zoomable User Interface, or ZUI, affords different views and layers to explore within a tool.
